title: The Booming Business of Trading Cards
itunes:title: The Booming Business of Trading Cards
description:
The trading card business has turned into a very hot commodity. Jason Masherah, President of Upper Deck joined the show to discuss the industry and how it has changed since its early days. He also touched on digital trading cards and how the grading of cards assesses their value. Don’t you wish you kept that Lebron James rookie card in better condition?

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
